title: Kitty Spit
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Kate Van Egmond
brief_description: Cat, Violet and Melody are Kitty Spit, a 3-piece band ready for good times and rock ‘n roll. However, Violet has broken up with her boyfriend and seems inconsolable. Cat and Melody do all they can to cheer her up, but will she ever be happy again? Girls, guitars and heartache - it’s what keeps them together.
